cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.invokable

Class SchedulableEnsembleProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.invokable.SchedulableProcess
      • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.invokable.SchedulableEnsembleProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SchedulableEnsembleProcess
extends SchedulableProcess
    Class representing schedulable ensemble process, which is used by the system to perform either triggered or periodic ensembling.
    Author:
    Michal Kit
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchedulableEnsembleProcess

        public SchedulableEnsembleProcess(KnowledgeManager km,
                          ProcessSchedule scheduling,
                          Membership membership,
                          ParameterizedMethod mapper,
                          java.lang.ClassLoader contextClassLoader)
        Returns SchedulableEnsembleProcess instance for specified membership function (in membership), mapping function (in mapper), scheduling type (in scheduling) and knowledge manager (km).
        Parameters:
        scheduling - describes the type of the schedulability for the ensemble
        membership - method used to evaluate the ensemble condition
        mapper - method used to perform data transfer in case of positive membership condition evaluation
        km - instance of the knowledge manager that is used for parameter retrieval
